resources.string: Super classes are also called Base classes.
Sub classes may also be called Derived classes.
A function cannot be defined inside another function
If return type for a function is not specified, it defaults to int
Names of functions in two different files linked together must be unique
It is not possible to achieve inheritance of structures in c++
A function may have any number of return statements each returning different values.
The assembly languages represent the only way to communicate directly with the computer
Exceptions can be caught and rethrown
You can only create an array of objects if the class has a default constructor.
C++ never provides a default constructor
In C all functions except main() can be called recursively.
Chocolate affects a dog\'s heart and nervous system; a few ounces are enough to kill a small dog.
